name: TimelyTilesHP11 - Tiles with arrow must have CTA button
id: stories/OCOM_HP/TimelyTilesHP11.story;TimelyTilesHP11 - Tiles with arrow must have CTA button

testSteps.description: Given User on the home page
When User hover on the Tiles which have arrow
Then User see overlay appears on the tile
Then on the overlay must have a button

userStory.narrative:
In order to communicate effectively to the business some functionality
As a development team
I want to use Behaviour-Driven Development
